update `CBIE`
CBIE01 = #{record.cbie01,jdbcType=INTEGER},

update `CBIE` set CBIE02 = #{cbie02,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CBIE03 = #{cbie03,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CBIE04 = #{cbie04,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CBIE05 = #{cbie05,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CBIE06 = #{cbie06,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CBIE07 = #{cbie07,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CBIE08 = #{cbie08,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CBIE09 = #{cbie09,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CBIE10 = #{cbie10,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CBIE11 = #{cbie11,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CBIE12 = #{cbie12,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CBIE13 = #{cbie13,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CBIE14 = #{cbie14,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CBIE15 = #{cbie15,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CBIE16 = #{cbie16,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where CBIE01 = #{cbie01,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT a.CBIE07,a.CBIE02,b.CBWA09,a.cbie10,a.CBIE01 FROM CBIE a LEFT JOIN CBWA b on a.CBIE09=b.CBWA01 where a.CBIE06=0 and b.cbwa12='条码管理'

SELECT a.CBIE07,a.CBIE02,b.CBWA09,a.cbie10,a.CBIE01 FROM CBIE a LEFT JOIN CBWA b on a.CBIE09=b.CBWA01 where a.CBIE06=0 and b.cbwa12='条码管理' and b.CBWA09 like concat('%', #{cbwa09}, '%')
and a.cbie07 like concat('%', #{cbie07}, '%') and a.CBIE02 >= #{startTime} and a.CBIE02 <=#{endTime}
and date_format(a.CBIE02,'%y%m%d') >= date_format(#{params.beginTime},'%y%m%d')
and date_format(a.CBIE02,'%y%m%d') <= date_format(#{params.endTime},'%y%m%d')
order by a.CBIE02 desc

SELECT a.CBIE07,CBIE02,b.CBWA09,i.CALA08,e.CBSA08,f.CBLA09,h.CBPA07,i.CALA08,g.CBPB12, g.CBPB15,g.cbpb08,d.CBIG10,d.CBIG13,d.CBIG15,d.CBIG15,a.CBIE01,d.CBIG12 from CBIE a LEFT JOIN CBWA b on b.CBWA01=a.CBIE09 LEFT JOIN CALA c on c.CALA01=a.CBIE16 LEFT JOIN CBIG d on d.CBIE01=a.CBIE01 LEFT JOIN CBSA e on e.CBSA01=d.CBIG14 LEFT JOIN CBLA f on f.CBLA01=d.CBIG08 LEFT JOIN CBPB g on g.CBPB01=d.CBIG09 LEFT JOIN CBPA h on h.CBPA01=g.CBPB14 LEFT JOIN CALA i on i.CALA01=g.CBPB10 where a.CBIE01= #{cbie01,jdbcType=INTEGER}
SELECT a.CBIE07,a.CBIE02,b.CBWA09,a.cbie10,a.CBIE01 FROM CBIE a LEFT JOIN CBWA b on a.CBIE09=b.CBWA01 where a.CBIE06=0 and b.cbwa12='数量管理'
